examples.example: 我已经报名参加了这次有意义的志愿者活动，很期待能贡献自己的一份力量。

translate.english: I have already signed up for this meaningful volunteer activity and am looking forward to contributing my own share.

examples.example: 我踊跃报名参加了社区组织的公益活动，希望能给他人带来温暖和帮助。

translate.english: I actively signed up to participate in the public welfare activities organized by the community, hoping to bring warmth and help to others.

examples.example: 我积极地报名参加了绘画比赛，渴望展示自己的才华。

translate.english: I actively signed up for the painting competition, eager to show my talent.
